- Add Fix Imports command

### 1.2.3
- Dispose the disposables

### 1.2.2

### 1.2.1
- More flexible diagnostic filtering API

### 1.2.0
- Focus back to original editor after removing unused imports

- New feature: "Remove Unused Imports" command
